text: John Tucker Mugabi Sentamu, Baron Sentamu, (; born 10 June 1949) is a retired bishop. ==References== ==Other websites== * Enthronement of the Archbishop of York, Timetable of Events * ITN interview, 7 February 2007 * * Debrett's People of Today Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Archbishops of York Category:People from Kampala
title: John Sentamu
